item.title: Why I went from a software engineer to a research assistant? Industry vs academia?
item.description: Iâ€™ve recently transited from working as a software engineer in a technology startups to a research assistant (RA) in electrical engineering. People are often interested and even surprised in my transition from working in the tech industry to academia.
